AND OG_TP_CD = #{ogTpCd} /* 조직유형코드 */
GROUP BY OG_TP_CD,ACTI_GDS_CD ) T2 ON T1.OG_TP_CD=T2.OG_TP_CD AND T1.ACTI_GDS_CD=T2.ACTI_GDS_CD AND T1.ACTI_GDS_SN=T2.MAX_ACTI_GDS_SN WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /* 데이터삭제여부 */ AND T1.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY T1.OG_TP_CD, T1.ACTI_GDS_SN DESC

SELECT b.ACTI_GDS_APLC_ID /* 활동물품신청ID */ , b.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ , b.ACTI_GDS_CD /* 활동물품코드 */ , b.ACTI_GDS_SN /* 활동물품일련번호 */ , b.OG_TP_CD || '-' || b.ACTI_GDS_CD || '-' || b.ACTI_GDS_SN AS ACTI_GDS_SET_CD , b.APLC_QTY , a.ACTI_GDS_NM /* 활동물품명 */ , (a.ACTI_GDS_AMT * b.APLC_QTY) ACTI_GDS_AMT , TO_CHAR(NVL(e.COUNT_MCN,0)) || ' / ' || TO_CHAR(a.PAT_DDTN_MCN) AS PAT_DDTN_MCN , CASE WHEN (e.COUNT_MCN)+1 = a.PAT_DDTN_MCN THEN ((a.ACTI_GDS_AMT * b.APLC_QTY ) - e.SUM_FEE_DDTN_DST_AMT) ELSE TRUNC((a.ACTI_GDS_AMT * b.APLC_QTY ) / a.PAT_DDTN_MCN) END AS PNPYAM_OC_AMT , e.MAX_FEE_DDTN_OC_DT , NVL(e.SUM_FEE_DDTN_DST_AMT,0) SUM_FEE_DDTN_DST_AMT , NVL(e.COUNT_MCN,1) COUNT_MCN , e.ACTI_GDS_DDTN_ID , b.ACTI_GDS_STDD_CD /* 활동물품규격코드 */ , g.ACTI_GDS_STDD_NM , b.PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ , d.ACTI_GDS_APLC_SN /* 활동물품신청일련번호 */ , d.ACTI_GDS_APLC_STAT_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'ACTI_GDS_APLC_STAT_CD', d.ACTI_GDS_APLC_STAT_CD, #{session.langId}) AS ACTI_GDS_APLC_STAT_NM , d.APLC_DT /* 최종 신청일자 */ , d.APLC_RSON_CN /* 최종 신청사유내용 */ , d.SPP_DT /* 최종 배송일자 */ , d.SPP_BZS_CD /* 최종 배송업체코드 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'SPP_BZS_CD', d.SPP_BZS_CD, #{session.langId}) AS SPP_BZS_NM , d.SPP_IVC_NO /* 최종 배송송장번호 */ , c.APLC_DT AS APLC_DT_S /* 신청일자 */ , f.PRTNR_KNM /* 성명 */ , f.BLD_NM , f.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , f.MEXNO_ENCR , f.CRAL_IDV_TNO , f.CLTN_DT /* 해약일자 */ , f.CNTR_DT /* 계약일자 */ , CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ WHERE OG_TP_CD = b.OG_TP_CD AND PRTNR_NO = b.PRTNR_NO AND BASE_YM <= SUBSTR(b.FST_RGST_DTM, 1, 6) ) > 0 THEN '추가' ELSE '신입' END BASE_DV_NM , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(h.CNTR_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1), 'YYYY-MM') AS START_YRMN , CASE WHEN a.PAT_DDTN_MCN = COUNT_MCN+1 THEN a.ACTI_GDS_AMT * b.APLC_QTY - e.SUM_FEE_DDTN_DST_AMT /*마지막 차수에 나머지 금액 포함하여 공제*/ WHEN e.THM_AMT IS NULL THEN CAST(a.ACTI_GDS_AMT * b.APLC_QTY / a.PAT_DDTN_MCN / 10 AS INT) * 10 ELSE e.THM_AMT END THM_AMT FROM TB_PSGA_ACTI_GDS_BAS a /*활동물품기본*/ INNER JOIN TB_PSGA_ACTI_GDS_APLC_IZ b ON (b.OG_TP_CD = a.OG_TP_CD AND b.ACTI_GDS_CD = a.ACTI_GDS_CD AND b.ACTI_GDS_SN = a.ACTI_GDS_SN AND b.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') /*활동물품신청내역*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PSGA_ACTI_GDS_APLC_STAT_IZ c ON (c.ACTI_GDS_APLC_ID = b.ACTI_GDS_APLC_ID AND c.ACTI_GDS_APLC_STAT_CD = '01' AND c.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') /*활동물품신청상태내역 - 신청정보*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT aa.ACTI_GDS_APLC_ID ,aa.ACTI_GDS_APLC_STAT_CD AS MAX_ACTI_GDS_APLC_STAT_CD ,aa.ACTI_GDS_APLC_SN /* 활동물품신청일련번호 */ ,aa.ACTI_GDS_APLC_STAT_CD ,aa.APLC_DT /* 신청일자 */ ,aa.APLC_RSON_CN /* 신청사유내용 */ ,aa.SPP_DT /* 배송일자 */ ,aa.SPP_BZS_CD /* 배송업체코드 */ ,aa.SPP_IVC_NO /* 배송송장번호 */ FROM TB_PSGA_ACTI_GDS_APLC_STAT_IZ aa INNER JOIN ( SELECT ACTI_GDS_APLC_ID, MAX(ACTI_GDS_APLC_SN) AS ACTI_GDS_APLC_SN FROM TB_PSGA_ACTI_GDS_APLC_STAT_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY ACTI_GDS_APLC_ID ) bb ON (bb.ACTI_GDS_APLC_ID = aa.ACTI_GDS_APLC_ID AND bb.ACTI_GDS_APLC_SN = aa.ACTI_GDS_APLC_SN) ) d ON (d.ACTI_GDS_APLC_ID = b.ACTI_GDS_APLC_ID) /*활동물품신청상태내역 - 최종상태정보*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ACTI_GDS_APLC_ID ,MAX(ACTI_GDS_DDTN_ID) ACTI_GDS_DDTN_ID ,MAX(FEE_DDTN_OC_DT) MAX_FEE_DDTN_OC_DT /*최종발생일자*/ ,NVL(SUM(FEE_DDTN_DST_AMT),0) SUM_FEE_DDTN_DST_AMT /*누적금액*/ ,NVL(COUNT(FEE_DDTN_DST_AMT),0) COUNT_MCN /*차수*/ ,SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(FEE_DDTN_OC_DT, 0, 6) = #{aplcDt} THEN FEE_DDTN_DST_AMT ELSE NULL END) THM_AMT /*당월금액*/ FROM TB_PSGA_ACTI_GDS_DDTN_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND PROCS_YN = 'Y' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
AND SUBSTR(FEE_DDTN_OC_DT, 0, 6) <= #{aplcDt}
GROUP BY ACTI_GDS_APLC_ID ) e ON (e.ACTI_GDS_APLC_ID = b.ACTI_GDS_APLC_ID) /*활동물품공제내역 - 공제정보*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT IZ.PRTNR_KNM /* 성명 */ , IZ.PRTNR_NO /* 번호 */ , MZ.BLD_NM , PB.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , PB.MEXNO_ENCR , PB.CRAL_IDV_TNO , IZ.OG_TP_CD , MZ.BASE_YM , IZ.BZ_STAT_CD , IZ.CLTN_DT /* 해약일자 */ , IZ.CNTR_DT /* 계약일자 */ FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ MZ /* 월조직내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ IZ /* 월파트너내역 */ ON IZ.BASE_YM = MZ.BASE_YM /* 기준년월 */ AND IZ.OG_TP_CD = MZ.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ AND IZ.OG_ID = MZ.OG_ID /* 조직ID */ AND MZ.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS PB ON IZ.OG_TP_CD = PB.OG_TP_CD AND IZ.PRTNR_NO = PB.PRTNR_NO ) f ON (f.PRTNR_NO = b.PRTNR_NO AND f.OG_TP_CD = b.OG_TP_CD AND f.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(b.FST_RGST_DTM, 1, 6)) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PSGA_ACTI_GDS_STDD_DV_DTL g ON (g.ACTI_GDS_STDD_DV_ID = a.ACTI_GDS_STDD_DV_ID AND g.ACTI_GDS_STDD_CD = b.ACTI_GDS_STDD_CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_DTL h ON (h.OG_TP_CD = b.OG_TP_CD AND h.PRTNR_NO = b.PRTNR_NO) WHERE 1=1 AND b.OG_TP_CD = #{ogTpCd} /*조직유형*/
AND SUBSTR(c.APLC_DT, 0, 6) = #{aplcDt} /*신청일자*/
